name: Orbital Bullet
description:
Orbital Bullet is a fast paced 360° action-platformer with rogue-lite elements. Travel to numerous procedural planets where monsters and dangers await you. Use found ressources to craft new weaponry & upgrades that will help you along your journey. Only a true master of the 360° combat will be able to save his home.Features360° Combat: Rethink the combat of platformers by fusing juicy 2D action with a 3D World
Handcrafted procedural Worlds: A delightful mixture of handcrafted and procedural generated Levels
Automatic Transitions: You cleared all enemies on the floor? Get automaticly fling straight back into the action to keep the pace and tension high
Permanent Progression: Unlock new items and paths through craftable gear and basebuilding
Impactful choices: Influence not only the difficulty and challenge of your run but also the development of your home and allies
